website_summaries.verdict: Organic multivitamin featuring 15 minerals and vitamins for men.
pros: Features vitamin D3, B12, and Omega-3s
Vegan, organic, and free of gluten, GMOs, and synthetic fillers

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and first off they’re too big to even consume. And later found out that it has fenu greek seeds in it which enhances breast and my husband started to develop man boobs. Threw them away right then. They smell so bad you want to throw up right when you open the bottle
customer_reviews.author: Zara

customer_reviews.title: Normal Urine!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these many times now and could not be more satisfied. They provide good energy and natural nutrition without the side affects of typical multivitamins. They don't make you feel like an alien by turning your urine neon-green, which I think is great, but some may actually want to feel like an alien. For anyone who wants to feel like an alien, do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Redelman

customer_reviews.title: Simply amazing! Try it! Quality! Potent!
customer_reviews.text: My chiropractor recommended these to me. They are amazing! The one and only thing that I don't like about them but at the same time, I LOVE... is that sometimes I'll have a burp that tastes like vitamins. It doesn't taste the best but you get use to it and honestly, this is how I know it's potent! It's not wrapped in sugar with other junk to make it fun to take. It's potent and quality. The occasional tasty burp is definitely not a deal breaker and for all I know, i'm the only one with this issue haha.
customer_reviews.author: Benro

customer_reviews.title: Best mens multi I've found yet
customer_reviews.text: Love this one a day. Nothing else I've found compares in terms of the quality of ingredients and the amount of different things packed into one tablet. It's a little on the large side but for what's in there that's to be expected. Love love love that most of the things in here come from "culture media" meaning no bs lab generated fakey stuff in here. New Chapter is one of the few honorable supplement companies out there, can't recommend this product enough.
customer_reviews.author: Basil

customer_reviews.title: Great Multi - Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using New Chapter Ever Man's One Daily Multi for a few months now and really like the product. They are one vitamin, once a day, and they aren't a horsepill. I was using a supplement that had much larger vitamins, and I had to take them twice a day to get the same benefits as this multi. I highly recommend this vitamin to anyone who is looking for a healthy alternative to the industry standard garbage vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: Wyochevy

customer_reviews.title: No comparison
customer_reviews.text: Best multivitamin I've ever had. You can taste the nature in it and I felt a difference after a week in my energy and physical balance. I truly enjoy how it's organic, with no suspicious ingredients. I even tried a few other natural vitamins, but this one just stood apart from the rest
customer_reviews.author: Rey G.

customer_reviews.title: Can take on an empty stomach.
customer_reviews.text: I don't have the greatest diet known to man so I felt I needed to supplement the nutrients I'm not getting with a multivitamin. I tried a few that where from known brands but every time I would get upset stomachs. I found out about this brand from my local co-op and haven't tried anything since. They are larger pills so that can be challenging if you struggle to swallow such large pills but being plant based you do not need to eat. You will not get an upset stomach or really gassy. It is a pleasant vitamin to take and will continue to purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nick T.

customer_reviews.title: Truly disgusting
customer_reviews.text: At the time of writing this review, I took my first (and definitely last) multivitamin about 2 hours ago. After vomiting immediately after ingesting due to its flavor, I brushed my teeth & tongue, ate pretzels & an apple, drank a ginger ale, and chewed mint gum, its flavor is still faintly present. The flavor itself tastes like what dog biscuits smell like and has a fowl odor, too. I wanted to try a new multi and a YouTuber i watch recommended this brand (he was not sponsored). I gave it a try and it goes without saying that I’ll be sticking with my daily gummy vitamin.
customer_reviews.author: Double A

customer_reviews.title: Here's what to know
customer_reviews.text: First of I Love these multivitamins, These pills actually make me feel energetic and stronger in a natrual way noticed a couple people talk about fenugreek causing them to develop man boobs, well check this out I'm a man and haven't noticed any "man boobs" I also follow up a good diet and a workout routine everyday and these pills helps by a far stretch
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Ive taken new chapter for years now. "THESE ARE NOT NEW CHAPTER VITAMINS". they look completly diffrent and what ever is in them you can not take on and empty stomace as I have for years.. Go to the vitimin store to get the real product
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: They actually work. Amazing. Our household noticed accelerated hair and nail growth within a month
customer_reviews.text: Get what you pay for. Can notice nails and hair growth within days. Am not alone. This isn't a placebo effect. As a gift I buy my friends and family the smallest, they are all now daily uses. Haven't found better. Subjectively and objectively too good to be true. Through my own use will/do testimony the quality and via several friends/co-workers we ALL recommended this year's ago, when it was advertised as 2/per day. It was in everyone's stocking stuffers when these first hot the market! Keep up the good work. I've tried several of the New Chapter Supplements with similar positive attributes.
customer_reviews.author: Donetta Trump

customer_reviews.title: A great, easy to digest vitamin!
customer_reviews.text: Typical vitamins would always bother my stomach so I just quit taking them. I then discovered these and since they were Organic/Non-GMO, I gave them a try. I love that they come in a glass bottle. Supplement companies are a dime a dozen so the highest quality was important to me. Since taking these I feel no negative effects on my stomach at all. Even on an empty stomach, I digest them just fine. They are rather big but I just cut them in half and have no problems taking them. Highly recommended if you are looking for a premium supplement.
customer_reviews.author: The RaZor

customer_reviews.title: Good overall multivitamin
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking these for a week now and they haven't given me an upset stomach so that's a good sign. I've been sleeping better the last few nights as well and attribute that to the vitamins as I haven't changed anything else in my routine. I like the fact I only take one of these per day.
customer_reviews.author: Simon S.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible quality brand you can trust
customer_reviews.text: We discovered new chapter back when we were looking for a suitable prenatal for my wife last year and were sold on their quality and we can confirm they are incredibly easy on the stomach both with food and without. my wife had a very nauseous first trimester and these were about the only things she could keep down with any consistency. Needless to say where were excited to find out they offered a multivitamin for men too
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive, too big, and too many broken ones that make it even harder to swallow.
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this product for over 2 years now and have purchased maybe 4-5 times. Occasionally there are a few broken ones but the most recent bottle had a bunch. My last bottle cost $34 and change, but now they are $46 and change. So with that I will be looking for an alternative. I refuse to pay a 33% mark-up. 🤷‍♂️
customer_reviews.author: emmytones

customer_reviews.title: Best multivitamin
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this is the best multivitamin I have ever used. Been taking it everyday for the past 5 months and I haven’t looked back since my first bottle. Sure, the price is a little bit higher than other multivitamins, but this stuff is excellent quality. I love that I can take it on an empty stomach in the morning (since I usually don’t eat breakfast) without it giving me any discomfort. Well worth the money in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Jason B

customer_reviews.title: I get what I need
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to give a perfect and raving review of a swallowable vitamin. There are no problems with this product, and I haven't been on it long enough to see if there will be any positive or negative effects. If it gives me what is on the bottle, this should be a good foundation for me.
customer_reviews.author: D Mars 23

customer_reviews.title: Vitamin pieces
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought these before in a store and believe it’s a good brand, my big issue is that about 15% of the vitamins are broke in pieces. I’ve tried to still use some of them but it hurts my throat going down so now some are going to waste which I’m not happy about. Not happy about this
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Good, But Be Careful
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says it does, but take note. It’s a decent sized pill, so it may not be easy to swallow. It also doesn’t taste great but that’s not a big deal for me. Despite the label saying otherwise, I have to take this vitamin with food as it upsets my stomach, so don’t take the label at face value.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: Gross! Don't buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some Vitamin options on Amazon and somehow, this product pops up on my screen. Looking at the overall score, I said to myself it's actually pretty good and I gave it a shot. Ugg.. When I tasted one tablet, I never wanna try a second time. What a sunk cost of 35 bucks! It's not worth it. The flavor is terrible!!
customer_reviews.author: Jiazhen

customer_reviews.title: Quality Standard
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality vitamin! It is potent and there is an obvious difference felt with these vs. the average generic brands found at Wal-Mart for example. The brown glass bottle is also appreciated to prevent toxic leaching from plastic bottles. The cons are that the pill is large, and the bottle cap was broken upon delivery (not the safety seal). The company needs to add proper packing to prevent the heavy glass bottle from jarred during transit.
customer_reviews.author: A Rose By Any Other Name

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much garbage. I need to switch back to NOW sports
customer_reviews.text: This pill goes down about as good as swallowing tree bark. I had been taking Now Sports for a long time, and just was curious if I could find a similar product in just 1 pill. Well pretty quickly upon switching my energy fell apart. I'm not nearly as energetic as I was, and my body is a little lethargic. Not something I am used to. Overall I feel these supplements are completely worthless and I would not recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Swallow
customer_reviews.text: I take a lot of supplements each day. These are by far the hardest to swallow pills I've ever taken. And I usually have zero problem taking pills. Additionally, about 10% of the pills were broken at the bottom of the bottle. Finally, I felt zero difference between taking these pills for a few weeks or not taking them when I missed a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: love the product
customer_reviews.text: love the product. However every time we order the mens and womens multi vitamin the price climbs higher and higher!!!!! You are not the only "good" vitamin company in town.Continue to rip us off and we will find another excellent multi vitamin company. End of story!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: Best vitamin
customer_reviews.text: This is the best multivitamin I've had in years (other one I used to use got discontinued) and I've tried pretty much all the major brands and some others. I've been very energized, and sleeping great!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Valitalo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent vitamin choice
customer_reviews.text: I have used these vitamins on and off for several years and enjoy the results. They settle well in my stomach and make me feel a good six to seven weeks younger! I highly recommend this product!

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great multivitamin! For anyone complaining about the sizes and taste... grow up. The taste is fine and the size is 100% manageable. I take it with five other pills and its all goes down easy.

customer_reviews.title: I really liked Garden of life

I'm actually just goblling them up now to finish off the bottle and try something else. Maybe they work for you. The best 'activation' I've felt is from Solgar and Garden of life. These were expensive too. Not my cup of tea.

customer_reviews.text: No Side Effect. Provide Energy/Nutrition. I am happy with this product and using it from past 6 to 7 years
customer_reviews.author: Rseth

customer_reviews.title: I take these and I feel better
customer_reviews.text: Could be placebo effect, but I take these and I feel better and it seems like I have more energy. I took them for about 4 months and then switched brands for 2 months and didn't feel as good. I switched back and voila, felt better. It's not the most scientific of studies, but it was enough for me to stick with them. They also have probiotics and can be taken on an empty stomach, which I have done and never had a stomach issue. So those are some extra benefits. Overall, my anecdotal evidence isn't concrete proof, but they work for me and I will continue to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Brickett

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than local health food store
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They are much cheaper on amazon than at my local health food store even when they have them on sale. Would definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Spend the money they are worth it
customer_reviews.text: They are not cheap but they are so much better that the cheap ones.

customer_reviews.text: This really helped me for my digestion. It has good nutrients level and is organic .

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I’d recommend this product, I’ve been using it for a while and it’s better than any others I’ve tried.

customer_reviews.title: Best vitamin out there
customer_reviews.text: I swear by the New Chapter line of organic, food-based vitamins. They are great because you can get a solid amount of necessary vitamins & minerals, in addition to superfoods for immune system, etc..., all within 1 pill per day. You can't forget and you can take them on empty stomach. I feel noticeably better when I take them.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Chamomile bad. No saw palmetto good.
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to work well. Taking one star off for including chamomile, which at least some sources report as problematic for male reproductive health. Props for not including Saw Palmetto for the same reason.
customer_reviews.author: Boris G

customer_reviews.title: One of the best multivitamin I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: New chapter vitamin is a great Multivitamin. One pill a day gives you all vitamin you need and the required energy. Believe it or not, when I take this vitamin in the morning with my breakfast, I do not fee hungry most of the day. I recommend this brand for everyone. Aouda Aljuhani Saudi Arabia.
customer_reviews.author: Aouda, Saudi Arebia

customer_reviews.title: Good vitamins
customer_reviews.text: I like these vitamins. I like knowing that I have the recommended daily allowance of vitamins before I even eat breakfast :-) They don't smell too good and sometimes they have a couple broken ones, that's why I didn't give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: waynesworld

customer_reviews.title: Good for my stomach
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a vitamin that doesn't make me feel ill. I finally found a good vitamin that does that. These are lamb! I'm very impressed with the quality of these vitamins, and I would recommend them highly.
customer_reviews.author: Pelland

product_meta.title: New Chapter Men's Multivitamin, Every Man's One Daily Fermented with Probiotics + Selenium + B Vitamins + Vitamin D3 + Organic Non-GMO Ingredients - 96 Count (Packaging May Vary) (ANC-199)
product_meta.description: Size:96 Count (Pack of 1)If you're looking for the right multivitamin for men, it's helpful to know there are differences between raw or USP multivitamins, gummy vitamins, and whole-food fermented multivitamins like New Chapter's Every Man's One Daily. Truth is, you can maximize your nutrient intake by choosing multivitamins that are fermented to enhance absorption. Our fermentation process unlocks and activates the full power of each nutrient, making our multivitamins much easier for your body to recognize as food and absorb. Expertly formulated to deliver heart support, immune support, energy & stress support for men's multivitamin needs. All New Chapter multivitamins are gentle enough to take anytime—even on an empty stomach. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.
feature_bullets: EASIER TO DIGEST: Men's multivitamin fermented with Whole Foods & Probiotics for better absorption, so your body can recognize it as food
ONE A DAY: Can be taken any time of day—Fermented multivitamin is easier to digest than isolated vitamins, and gentle even on an empty stomach. No nausea.
MULTIVITAMIN FOR MEN: Expertly formulated for your needs including stress, energy, heart, immune, and bone support
SUPERFOODS: Clean, whole-food fermented multivitamin delivers Superfoods like Ginger, organic Turmeric & Maca
Made with Certified Organic Vegetables Herbs, Non-GMO Project Verified, Vegetarian, Certified Kosher, Certified Gluten Free, No Synthetic Fillers, No Animal Gelatin (added to some gummy vitamins)
